content: I notice when posting ... in the last box on the right [LAST POST] it gives the date and the time. We have been posting one after another and it shows up two hours ahead of my local time. So ... is 'Post Time' on Mountain Standard Time? And if so ... Why?
reply: I notice when posting ... in the last box on the right [LAST POST] it gives the date and the time. We have been posting one after another and it shows up two hours ahead of my local time. So ... is 'Post Time' on Mountain Standard Time? And if so ... Why?
title: Is "Posting Time" MST

content: The posting time is set for west coast time, because that's where the website server is.
reply: The posting time is set for west coast time, because that's where the website server is.
title: Is "Posting Time" MST

content: Thank You gypsysnipe. I appreciate your response.

content: quote: Originally posted by majorjim: I notice when posting ... in the last box on the right [LAST POST] it gives the date and the time. We have been posting one after another and it shows up two hours ahead of my local time. So ... is 'Post Time' on Mountain Standard Time? And if so ... Why? majorjim, You can set the time you choose by going to your personal zone, then preferences, then My Time Display. Robert

reply: majorjim, You can set the time you choose by going to your personal zone, then preferences, then My Time Display. Robert
